name: corpulence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being fat: He was nicknamed “Hippo” because of his corpulence. We know King Henry VIII for his wives, perhaps, or for his corpulence. See
corpulent
More examplesFewer examplesSlimming soap is being advertised as being a rare Eastern remedy for corpulence.He was tall, ruddy-faced and tending to corpulence.When as a child I had alluded to Mr Broadhurst's corpulence, my mother had snapped at me.
